DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to compare two pharmacist-led population management strategies designed to increase the rate of appropriate monitoring of vitamin B12 and serum creatinine for patients taking metformin.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Pharmacist-led Population Management Approaches to Increase Monitoring of Vitamin B12 and Serum Creatinine Levels for Patients on Metformin
DOC.criteria: On Metformin for at least one year Activated patient portal for electronic messaging Patient of an attending physician at Ohio State General Internal Medicine No serum vitamin B12 and/or no serum creatinine measurement in the past year
